member.name: T:MegaMek_Scenario_Generator.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:MegaMek_Scenario_Generator.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:MegaMek_Scenario_Generator.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:MegaMek_Scenario_Generator.My.Resources.Resources.Atmospheres
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Vacuum, Trace, Thin, Standard, High, Very High.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Tilted, Not Tilted, Circular, Elliptical.
